code: import React,{useState}from'react';import PostItem from'../components/PostItem';import{DUMMY_POSTS}from'../data';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Posts=()=>{const[posts]=useState(DUMMY_POSTS);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"posts",children:posts.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"posts__container",children:posts.map(_ref=>{let{id,thumbnail,category,title,description,authorID}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostItem,{postID:id,thumbnail:thumbnail,category:category,title:title,description:description,authorID:authorID},id);})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"No posts found"})});};export default Posts;
